id: Complete Daily Journal - A clearer more meaningful life
name: Complete Daily Journal - A clearer more meaningful life
description: Holistic daily journal in Notion for a more intentional and meaningful lifeMost of us know the benefits of journaling, yet we often struggle to make a habit out of it. This template has been designed to help people form this habit by giving them a comprehensive journal system to feel more fulfilled in everyday life.How it worksThe template has been made for users to make a habit of journaling through an easy-to-use and powerful system. Set, reflect and understand your daily life for a clearer mo
features: Create a new journal entry with the ready-to-use New Journal template; Use the properties and the journal page to get ready for the coming day (feelings property, grateful practice, What would the perfect today look like? and more); Look back on your day (star rating, things to improve, open journal, and more); Use the different views to get a quick visual and written understanding of what you did and how you felt during certain periods
